content:
Dear All,
the expansions provided on the ValueSet descriptions pages do not follow the specification of the is-a operator. The spec says "...(including the concept itself)" but none of the (couple of) value sets I checked contained the concept itself.
https://www.hl7.org/fhir/snomedct.html#4.2.1.0.6.1
E.g. https://www.hl7.org/fhir/valueset-additional-instruction-codes.html#expansion or https://www.hl7.org/fhir/valueset-specimen-container-type.html#expansion
